channel.title: 3mpwr App - Curated Disability News

item.title: Could Canada Post workers strike again ahead of holidays? What we know
item.description: As the holidays approach, many business owners are reminded of last year's nationwide Canada Post strike and are wondering if it could happen again as labour woes persist.

item.title: Quebec daycare crash: Final arguments begin in challenge of high-risk offender status
item.description: Final arguments are set to begin in a hearing involving a Quebec man who killed two children and injured six others when he drove a city bus into a Montreal-area daycare in 2023.

item.title: Carney set to announce next list of major projects

item.title: Unheard. Unserved: After costly U.S. surgery, endometriosis patient pushes for more options
item.description: An endometriosis patient is calling for more surgery options at home in Nova Scotia after travelling to the United States for surgery.
